name: Beavs Behaving Badly
description:
This game is about a little Chinchilla called Gibby and his quest to find his wife. 

Made by Charlotte Marriner (programmer), Sam Marsh (artist) and Ben Nicholls (narrative). This game was made in 2 days for a Games Jam with the topic '80's RPG', hence a text-based adventure (with some visual content).
